column5: Sunday is the Niagara Outdoor Show in Ft Erie http://www.niagaraoutdoorshow.com/  Two weeks later, on the Saturday, is the Hamilton Bassmasters swap.  March 25th  I will be at both.
March 25 is on my list. See ya then Bruce. Oh, SALSA is a must so I have been firmly told. Might need to go the next level up from mild.LOL
